website_summaries.verdict: HP markets the Officejet H470wbt to the mobile business professional, but it chose aesthetics over performance. The sleek design and cost-effective cartridges give its rating a slight boost, but the degradation of print quality from the previous model is definitely a deal breaker.
cons: dSLR owners will miss the CompactFlash port

customer_reviews.title: Great Portable Printer
customer_reviews.text: I have used this printer now for over four months. It has traveled to Africa and back and been carried around in various bags and backpacks and given one heck of a workout under adverse conditions. If one needs a printer that will actually work under field conditions, I can strongly recommend this printer. The battery life was a pleasant surprise too. It will allow printing of fairly extensive documents without running out. No, it is not as good a printer per se as the big multi-purpose printers in my office and Lab but it works out in the field when we need it.
customer_reviews.author: DA

customer_reviews.title: HP H470b Office Jet
customer_reviews.text: Great product for portable printing. Only issue that the printer is a little bulky for packaging in a carry-on bag for traveling. Battery and bluetooth options combine to allow for less plugs and cables to be carried. There's a concern with the construction if the baggage handlers at the airports throw it around - I purchased, and highly recommend, the travel case - it's a great protector for your investment. Speed, quality of print and ease of use are all great.Highly recommended for anyone that needs portability!
customer_reviews.author: Carl

customer_reviews.title: compact but not as fast as wished
customer_reviews.text: The H470 is a nifty little printer and prints very fast, but there is always a delay of 10-30 seconds before printing even starts. At times the delay is followed by a message of a mis-aligned cartridge, so I find myself a bit frustrated at times. The telling statistic is that if I had it to do over again, I would have done even more research and probably gotten a different printer. jw
customer_reviews.author: John Walker

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and quiet, minor problem with HP
customer_reviews.text: Downloaded drivers from hp.com/support to avoid problems noted at other forums. Easy to use, love the two sided function(brings joy to my cheap little heart). Only problem is with HP not the printer. To use the wireless function I must use the HP wireless adapter, printer will not even acnkowledge my Linksys adapter.
customer_reviews.author: Village Farmer

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Works excellent. Just make sure to go online and download the latest drivers don't use the driver disk provided.
customer_reviews.author: Charles E. Canaday

customer_reviews.title: excellent printer
customer_reviews.text: the printer fits in my truck i can use it in a moments notice. i looked all over for a small portable printer. i found this one online and thought i would try it. my trucking business is just getting off the ground and this printer will keep me up and going. no need to stop and make copies at a store or other place.would recommend to anyone needing a protable printer.
customer_reviews.author: ken

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The HP H470 is the perfect travel / work printer for the on the road printing needs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Decent Portable Printer
customer_reviews.text: This printer works good but it is very noisy. It sounds like it's going to break everytime I use it. I was really surprised by how loud it is. We typically use Canon's portable printers but I was looking for something cheaper. Well, if I had known how loud this one was I would have spent the extra money on a Canon printer.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca McAsey

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This printer was quick and easy to install and use. Had it working in five minutes including adding ink cartridges! No problems connecting to an older laptop. Printer cover is not as sturdy as had hoped, but it is a good product.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Smith

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: I received this product as scheduled; the installation was simple; the use of the product was easy; the printing is great; and the compactability is unbelievable! My magical thinking tells me that I need to petition HP to add a scan capability to it. Bryan
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Bradford

customer_reviews.title: Neat little printer.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this portable printer because of limited space but have been well pleased with the results thus far.
customer_reviews.author: William Griffin

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this printer to take with us to meetings to print name badges, certificates, etc that we sometimes need to at our meeting registration desk. We took it to just 1 meeting before the port that connects the printer to the laptop became loose and no longer worked. Couldn't return to the seller as we hadn't thought to keep the original package materials. Tried to work with HP but it turned out that the seller had purchased it back in 2007 so the warrenty is no longer in effect.
customer_reviews.author: Amberms

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT !!!
customer_reviews.text: The Printer worked Perfectly right out of the Box, it was exactly what was described...A Super Good Deal, Thank You
customer_reviews.author: Martha L. Smith

customer_reviews.title: yes-yes
customer_reviews.text: First class business tool.Nice pictures and color.lightening quick This would be the ultimate if you could copy and scan with it also!!
customer_reviews.author: yepper

customer_reviews.title: Convenient on the go!
customer_reviews.text: This printer is convenient on the raod with its smaller size and battery power source where AC power is not readily available. The bluetooth conectivity would have probably made it even more convenient, but I'm satisfied overall.
customer_reviews.author: Magic Man

customer_reviews.title: Transport invoiced twice
customer_reviews.text: HP H470b Office Jet Mobile Printer The price of the printer included transportation to Denmark. All the same UPS did also invoice me for transportation. I returned the invoice to UPS including the invoice from the seller (specifying transportation). Of course I did not pay twice. UPS did not answer my claim. Instead they have sent me reminder in spite of my communication. I think the seller must either pay or have UPS to cancel their invoice to me! John Steenberg
customer_reviews.author: John Steenberg

customer_reviews.title: Great little printer!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this printer as my old H470 died after 5 years of faithful service. It was exactly like my old one except for the fact that this one has a battery included, which my old one did not. The battery will last for about 50 sheets of printing, more or less. It's pretty fast, and at 22ppm doesn't waste time getting that all-important first page out. All in all, if you are looking for a fast, portable, high-quality inkjet printer and you don't mind expensive ink cartridges (I ONLY use HP cartridges)...this is the printer for you!
customer_reviews.author: Douglas Bradshaw

customer_reviews.title: Junk!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: My office bought 12 of these. One was dead right out of the box. Two more failed within the warranty period. The last one failed 4 weeks after the warranty was up. HP told me it could not be repaired. The build quality of these is very poor all of our problems have concerned the print head. Cheap plastic appears to blame. The performance of the printer is not very good either. Print quality is OK, but it is very slow, has little internal mememory, and great care has to be used inserting the paper or it will not load right. Cartridge life is not very good either.
customer_reviews.author: A. Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Will Never Buy HP Printer Again
customer_reviews.text: I had purchased HP H470 wfb printer for travel. On the flights ink cartridges would leak. The printer broke down during HP's warranty period. Called HP and was informed that it was out of warranty, when in fact I had my receipt in front of me, to my surprise HP support based in India, informs me that the warranty starts from the DATE OF MANUFACTURE and not from the date of purchase. The warranty support instead wanted to sell me a refurbised HP printer for more than the price of the printer on Amazon, I said thanks, but, no thanks. I have three HP printer sitting here that do not work, all within the warranty period.
customer_reviews.author: S. Dhaliwal

customer_reviews.title: Great Mobile Printer
customer_reviews.text: This is a great printer and has come in handy more than once. I am in the military and do a great deal traveling around and this printer has been there to do the job numerous times. It is nice and compact where it fits in the same backpack as the laptop that I use it on. Have been able to print out items in the field being has a battery on the printer as well. Very lightweight and rugged as well. Is able to withstand some rough handling and bumping and still work like a champ. All around great product.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Woods

customer_reviews.title: Incompatible with the HP Mini
customer_reviews.text: Odd that HP would make portable printers and ultra portable computers that are mutually incompatible. The HP Mini has one resolution - 1024X576. The HP H470b won't install without 800X600. Two online support requests advised changing resolution - which is impossible with a Mini. Third attempt accomplished escalation of the support request - 4 days ago - no additional support forthcoming.
customer_reviews.author: Warren J. Talbot

customer_reviews.title: Nifty, thrifty little printer
customer_reviews.text: This sturdy, little HP printer seems to be a work horse. It is perfect for printing ready-to-sign documents when with a client in the field. As near as I can sense, it has all the qualities of a larger model, but is small and light enough to carry with my laptop together in one case. I've had no problems at all and would recommend it without reservation.
customer_reviews.author: Probity guy

customer_reviews.title: very pleased with printer
customer_reviews.text: I've been a long time fan of HP printers - the quality and reliability are exceptional. I purchased this printer for business trips, and found it fit the bill perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: KB

customer_reviews.title: Check your box for missing items
customer_reviews.text: Bought this printer only because all our old printers will not work with my new laptop with Vista. Printer works okay but sometimes paper jams and printer gets "amnesia". But my biggest gripe is that the printer arrived with missing software and I had the extra expense of purchasing said software from the HP website and had to await arrival of software before I could even set up my printer. I am a college professor and my time and documents are very important.
customer_reviews.author: G. Paul

product_meta.title: HP H470b Officejet Mobile Printer
product_meta.description:
HP H470b Office Jet Mobile Printer. Get the best solution for printing on the go. The HP Officejet H470b Mobile Printer series with optional wireless capability provides a complete mobile printing system. Get more done with the worlds fastest mobile printer. With print speeds up to 22 pages per minute /ppm/ black and white and up to 18 ppm color, this printer is way ahead of the competition. Save ink and money our specially formulated inks are designed for efficiency. Plus, this printers HP Vivera Ink cartridge prints more pages than the ink cartridges that support competing mobile printers. Easily print in cars, clients offices, or even airports, with optional Bluetooth and WiFi adapters. Print from a variety of mobile devices including your notebook PC, PDA, digital camera, phone, or memory card using the printers USB port. Count on this rugged, durable printer to perform consistently day in and day out. We drop tested the printer to ensure it can handle the rigors of daily travel and we are confident that you will experience equally impressive results. Experience hassle free printing. Print large jobs easily with the fold up 50 sheet paper feeder. Receive convenient low ink alerts and shop for supplies using HP SureSupply. Improve efficiency and flexibility. The printer works with multiple operating systems including Windows, Macintosh, Palm OS, and more. Plus, with a duty cycle of up to 500 pages a month, it is perfectly calibrated to meet the needs of even the busiest mobile professional.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
From the Manufacturer Want to print business documents that make the right impact? Then you need an HP Officejet. Get professional-quality printing at a price your business can afford.

SPECIFICATIONS:

Print Speed: 
Up to 22 ppm black, up to 18 ppm color(1) 


Print From: 
PictBridge®-enabled cameras, memory cards, USB, PC/Mac® 


Paper Handling: 
3" x 4" to 8.5" x 14"; up to 500 pages per month 


FEATURES:

Built-in Wireless Printing



Built-in Wired Networking



Two-sided Printing



Memory Card Slots



Color LCD Screen



4 x 6 Color Photo Printing



Lithium-ion Battery



Bluetooth® Wireless Adapter 


INCLUDED NOT INCLUDED PRINT BUSINESS DOCUMENTS ON THE GO
• Print up to 480 pages using the rechargeable lithium-ion battery
• Bring this lightweight printer (only 5 pounds) wherever the job takes you
• The rugged design was drop-tested to make sure it can handle your day on the go
• Print from notebook PCs, PDAs, cell phones and digital cameras using the USB port or an optional wireless adapter(2)
• Use the memory card slots to print from a Secure Digital/MultiMedia Card
• Save time with the world’s fastest mobile printer(3)
• Ultra-compact, fold-up paper tray holds up to 50 pages or 5 envelopes


BOOST YOUR BUSINESS IMAGE
• Create professional-quality documents on the go
• Print the exact quantities you need to save money and paper
• Produce documents on the spot to avoid having outdated or extra copies


For business templates and tips on growing and marketing your business, visit the HP Creative Studio at www.hp.com/print.


SAVE ENERGY 
• Count on this ENERGY STAR® qualified product

REMEMBER COMPATIBLE INK, PAPER AND ACCESSORIES
• HP, the #1 brand in ink is the #1 value
• Count on laser-quality black text, vibrant color graphics and sharp-looking photos using Original HP Vivera inks
• Print up to 65% more pages than bargain inks(4) using Original HP ink
• Create professional-quality business documents using a variety of Original HP paper
• Connect your PC to this HP printer easily using a USB cable


 See all the compatible ink and recommended papers here

RECYCLE 
• Recycle your print cartridges for free: visit www.hp.com/recycle for details

In 2006, HP recycled more than 164 million pounds of hardware and print cartridges—the same weight as 600 jumbo jets.

 (1) After first page; see www.hp.com/go/inkjetprinter for details.
(2) Wireless printer adapter not included, sold separately.
(3) Based on published manufacturer specifications of the highest rated speeds available for A4 mobile printers under $500 as of July 2007. Test methods vary. HP Officejet H470 Mobile Printer series fastest black speed based on HP 98 cartridge only.
(4) A QualityLogic 2009 study compared Original HP inkjet print cartridges (92A, 93A, 98A, 95A, 21A and 22A) with refilled ink cartridges sold in North America. For details, see www.qualitylogic.com/2009HPinktest.pdf


ENERGY STAR and the ENERGY STAR logo are registered U.S. marks.
feature_bullets: Print Speeds up to 22 ppm Black and White and Up to 18 ppm Color
Fold Up 50 Sheet Feeder w/Tray Extender/ Automatic Fold Out Output Door
Wi Fi Profile Switch Lets You Store Settings for 3 Different 802.11 Environments

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.8 out of 5 stars35 ratings3.8 out of 5 stars
